headline: Elevance Health (NYSE:ELV) Faces Class Action Over Medicaid Cost Misrepresentation
summary: Elevance Health (NYSE:ELV) recently faced significant legal challenges and financial performance concerns that have impacted its stock performance. A class action lawsuit alleges misrepresentation regarding Medicaid cost trends, which, together with disappointing earnings and reduced guidance, has created a challenging environment for the company. Over the last quarter, Elevance's stock price moved 2.66%, a contrast to the market's 3.9% rise in the past week and 12% increase over the past...
